testsuite.name: exercise.TC_01_ServiceNow_Login_Positive_Negative
testsuite.system-out: verify title is ServiceNow verify username text field has label of User name enter username verify password text field has label of Password enter password verify forgot password is visible to the user verify user can see the login button ServiceNow HomePage Title >>> ServiceNow
verify title is ServiceNow click on login button enter username click on login button
